objects.description: [SimBad](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0419) registers for the `BOOT_COMPLETED` and `USER_PRESENT` broadcast intents, which allows the software to perform actions after the device is booted and when the user is using the device, respectively.(Citation: CheckPoint SimBad 2019)

external_references.description: Elena Root, Andrey Polkovnichenko. (2019, March 13). SimBad: A Rogue Adware Campaign On Google Play. Retrieved November 21, 2019.
